data.title: Sinclair Full Synthetic Motor Oil
data.text:
Full Synthetic Motor Oil

Today’s engines are being designed by OEMs to be smaller, while producing more power. This change in design requires a brand of motor oil that has kept pace. And that’s just what you’ll get with Sinclair Full Synthetic Motor Oils. As engine designs have changed, so have our formulations and technology. And that means you can count on Sinclair to provide advanced oils that can stand up to the challenge of balancing your needs for protection, toughness and endurance.

Sinclair Full Synthetic Motor Oil features a 100% pure synthetic base oil along with our most progressive additive technology. It delivers our ultimate, longest-lasting engine protection, fuel efficiency, strength, and cleanliness.

And our technology also delivers a powerful, long-lasting, high-performance oil to control friction and keep metal surfaces from coming into contact.

Sinclair dexos1™ Approved Motor Oils meet or exceed GM dexos1™ specifications for warranty requirements for all GM automotive gasoline engines currently in use worldwide, and are fully licensed by GM.

Get increased engine life and ultimate levels of protection and endurance from the pure formulations of Sinclair Full Synthetic Motor Oils.
